snippet: Les Moonves ‘s compensation was 21 percent more than he received a year earlier.
abstract: CBS Corp announces that its chief executive, Leslie Moonves, received $69.9 million in 2011 total compensation, 21 percent more than a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Les Moonves ‘s compensation was 21 percent more than he received a year earlier.

headline.seo: Moonves of CBS Was Paid $69.9. Million for 2011
headline.main: CBS’s Chief Executive Was Paid $69.9. Million for 2011
headline.print_headline: CBS’s Chief Executive Was Paid $69.9. Million For 2011
